# PDFWidgetCellState.mixedState

**Case**

The button widget is in a mixed state, neither on nor off.

## Declaration

```swift
case mixedState
```

## Choosing a Cell State

- **PDFWidgetCellState.onState**: The button widget is in a selected state.
- **PDFWidgetCellState.offState**: The button widget is in an unselected state.

items.description: The button widget is in a selected state.
items.name: PDFWidgetCellState.onState

items.description: The button widget is in an unselected state.
